```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)


here::here()
data_dir <- here("qualitycontrol")


gca <- read.delim2(here(data_dir, "GPD_accessionList_messy.txt"))
gca <- subset(gca, !grepl("#", Host_range_isolates))
gca <- subset(gca, gca$Host_range_isolates!="No")
gca <-as.data.frame(unique(gca$Host_range_isolates))

ivig.acc <- read.delim2(here(data_dir, "contig_ivig_list.txt"), header=FALSE)
ivig.acc <- subset(ivig.acc, !grepl("uvig", V1))
ivig.acc <- ivig.acc %>% separate(V2, into=c("access.alt", "access", "ignore","etc"), sep="_", extra="merge", remove=FALSE)


ivig.acc$access <- ifelse(ivig.acc$access=="", ivig.acc$ignore, ivig.acc$access)

uniq <- unique(ivig.acc$access)

```
